CustomProfile.Description: Akai Katana Shin for NESiCAxLive is an enhanced version of Cave’s bullet‑hell shooter Akai Katana. This horizontal scrolling shmup features intense bullet patterns and the ability to slash enemy shots into steel that can be used against foes. As Cave’s fourth horizontal shooter, it blends lush 2D graphics with challenging patterns and multiple shot types. The Shin edition, released on the NESiCAxLive arcade download service, refines the original with rebalanced gameplay and improved visuals.
